messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] rooms being repainted while kids are gone
messages.msgSnippet: That s alright. Yeah, I could have too. I ve never been as girly-girl as my mother would have preferred. I think I ended up with an allergy to little bitty
messages.messageBody:
That's alright. Yeah, I could have too. I've never
been as girly-girl as my mother would have preferred.
I think I ended up with an allergy to little bitty
rosebud prints after that one.

It wasn't long after that that I decided I wanted to
fly the F14 Tomcat, shaved my hair off into a military
cut and pasted up Tomcat photos all over my wall.

And the hair..shoulda heard the ruckus the other
cheerleaders gave me over it since I couldn't wear the
hairbow! Nothing wrong with cheerleading, I absolutely
loved it, but it sure was fun when the girls saw my
head shaved!

Unfortunately my mother went and cut her hair short as
mine not long afterward since "Well, it looks good on
you so I knew it would look good on me since you look
so much like me." Can't win with my mother, let me
tell ya!


Elizabeth

> Daylight Time,

> Next thing I
> knew my mother had repainted it a light pinky-purple
> and replaced the carpeting to match and thrown up
> --------------
>
> Just thought I'd cut it off right there for
> entertainment value.
>
> I'd might've thrown up too. <bwg>
>
> (just joking)
>
>
> Here's what it really said:
>
> -=- my mother had repainted it a light pinky-purple
> and replaced the carpeting to match and thrown up
> little bitty pink rosebud printed curtains and
> matching bed linens. -=-
>
> Sandra

messages.subject: rooms being repainted while kids are gone
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/14/2004 3:35:46 PM Mountain Daylight Time, ladyeliza_r@yahoo.com writes: Next thing I knew my mother had repainted it a light pinky-purple
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/14/2004 3:35:46 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
ladyeliza_r@... writes:
Next thing I
knew my mother had repainted it a light pinky-purple
and replaced the carpeting to match and thrown up
--------------

Just thought I'd cut it off right there for entertainment value.

I'd might've thrown up too. <bwg>

(just joking)


Here's what it really said:

-=- my mother had repainted it a light pinky-purple
and replaced the carpeting to match and thrown up
little bitty pink rosebud printed curtains and
matching bed linens. -=-

Sandra
